entry.title: Studying in UESTC
entry.content:
UESTC

From Freshman to junior year

In 2021, entered UESTC with a college entrance exam score of 641.

In my freshman year, I found the school a bit dullâ€”it felt like I was still living the same boring life as in high school, even though I was already in universityğŸ¤¦ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸. Maybe it was because there were so few girls, and I only had few close friend who I really clicked withğŸ˜¢.

It wasnâ€™t until sophomore year that I gradually found my direction and rhythm. Of course, I would also go to the other main campus to attend concerts and social eventsğŸ˜.

Junior year was the most interesting for meâ€”I finally left Chengdu, a city I wasnâ€™t very fond ofğŸ¥², and as I started my internship, I experienced living independently for the first timeğŸ¥³.

Best friend in Uestc

She said we are destined to be friends. Totally moved by those words at that time. Actually we have been friends for three years in Uestc. Before the final exams every semester, we worked hard in library togetherğŸ™‡ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸. Thanks for your companyğŸ’“

Eat delicious food every weekendï½The summer was too hot, so I cooled off with some refreshing haitang tofu pudding.When the weather gets cold, I enjoy eating hotpot and barbecueğŸ˜‹

Ginkgo trees in autumn

The ginkgo photo shoot was taken for me by a very kind senior.Every autumn, when the ginkgo leaves turn yellow, many visitors come to the school to take photosğŸ

Eastern Suburb Memory in winter

One winter, a classmate suggested a photo shoot. Even though they were just practicing with me, I still held on with the spirit of a determined model and made sure we got the shotsğŸ¤¦ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸

entry.title: Hello Yaxin
entry.content:
Welcome to My Blog! This is my first post. I love pretty and shiny things, like Christmas trees, butterflies, and ice cubes sparkling in the sunlightâœ¨. Even though Iâ€™m aiming to become an AI engineer, I also have a casual love for Web development.

A brief understanding of meğŸ©°

MBTI is INFJ

The INFJ personality type is like a hidden gardenğŸŒ·, full of depth and mystery, where every thought and feeling blooms with purpose. They are dreamers, wrapped in a quiet empathy that flows like a gentle river, always seeking to understand the world and those around them on a deeper level. Their intuition is like stardust, guiding them toward paths others might not see, and their hearts beat with a deep compassionâ¤ï¸â€ğŸ”¥, always striving to make the world a more beautiful, meaningful place.
